p:
Peeri et al. have estimated the COVID-19 case-fatality rate to be 2%, much less than SARS or MERS but 20 times greater than seasonal influenza. Most COVID-19 cases have been older men with comorbidities such as cardiovascular disease, diabetes and hypertension. Over half of the initial cases in China, 66%, had been directly exposed to a live animal market before the disease began spreading rapidly from person to person.
11
